attributes.review: I open the app to find multiple pictures and petitions for me to sign up for Donald Trump‘s child pedophilia ring! I was horrified! He is trying to get this apps to children so they unknowingly sign up for something that could potentially harm them. There was also a tab of Yertle the turtle trying to do the renegade, a popular dance on TikTok . I was very scared.
attributes.title: Unspeakable horrors

attributes.review: so my dog starts choking on a ping pong ball so i’m frantically trying to call 911 but this TRASH of an app decides to open up on its own and then show a picture of a monsterous cheeto puff getting spray tanned BUTT NAKED. at this point my dog is seizing on the floor. the app continues to glitch showing me more explicit photos that my poor eyes as well as my choking dog’s didn’t want to see. she ended up dying because we couldn’t get my phone to work to call help and it’s all your fault frumpy. that’s why i rate this one star 😞
attributes.title: absolutely horrible pls don’t get this

attributes.review: The app is awful. As soon as you enter your number it glitches out ridiculously, takes a long time to load, and doesn’t send a verification code to your phone immediately. it took hours for my verification code to come in. in the meantime, i was harassed with distasteful images of an orange man in a suit. these have been surrounding me on other platforms as well such as ads on instagram, youtube, snapchat, etc. i can’t help but think it is haunted. please delete this app as soon as possible
attributes.title: Possibly Cursed, Extremely Glitchy
